original_text: He did things that the Lord said were evil, as Ahab's family had done. Ahab's family became advisors to Ahaziah after his father died, and they caused Ahaziah's death.
korean_text: 그의 아버지가 죽은 후에 그가 패망하게 하는 아합의 집의 가르침을 따라 여호와 보시기에 아합의 집 같이 악을 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: He did things that the Lord said were evil
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님이 악하다고 말씀하신 일들을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: Ahab's family became advisors to Ahaziah
